items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very shear but SO cute!
items.body: SUPER CUTE DRESS!!! But fair warning, it is completely see through. The fit is very flattering and comfortable. I would say runs pretty true to size. Great dress if you can find a bra and underwear that goes with the color you get so that the shear is only really evident on the tummy area. I wore a brown bralette and dark nude undies with the dress. I feel like the shear wasn’t that obvious on my legs. Overall, bc I was able to style this dress appropriately, I loved it! Read more
items.author: maira z

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute but clear
items.body: Good quality and was cute but it was straight SEE THROUGH. It ended up working for me but don’t buy if you need coverage. Literally transparent. Read more
items.author: Benita Smedes

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So sparkly!!
items.body: So cute and flattering!! Sheer but I wore nude undergarments and that worked. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Greattt night dress
items.body: LOVE top part is see thru so wear pasties and no one can tell. Fitted from top flowy from bottom. Read more
items.author: emrodriguez921

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress well made but stains!!!!
items.body: I got this dress for new years and it’s gorgeous!!! Completely see through so u gotta wear nude seamless underwear. I bought the brown and black and surprisingly the brown was thicker than the black. Like I could feel each individual rhinestone on the black dress whereas I just felt the fabric in the brown. But it was comfortable enough and there’s the side panel (pictured) that doesn’t have rhinestones so it doesn’t bother your underarms. So as for new years, obviously I was in it all night and I was dancing and I’m surprised to say even with the packed dance floor and the multitude of drinks spilled on me… no rhinestones came off. I bought this dress to be a one night thing but honestly it’s pretty well made. My only complaint is when I took it off. OMG. The pasties I was wearing are now permanently dyed purple… and my skin was a darker hue. The skin thing was easily washed but I still can’t get it out of the silicone pasties so that kinda sucks. Read more
items.author: NINA list

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So fun
items.body: Wore this to pride and it was a huge hit! Fit well was very sheer defenity worth the money Read more
items.author: Sedona

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Need to hide your stuff
items.body: Gorgeous but completely see through. No liner Read more

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Transparente
items.body: Lo amo!!! Queda perfecto al cuerpo, el único detalle sería q es transparente. Pero queda bien lindo. Read more
items.author: Keily Cabrera Cardona

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Hunter Green, White, Apricot, Black, Light Pink, Coffee, Navy Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
